error: type error
- testdata/err/closure_type_mismatch.tn:1:8
1 | main = || -> i32 { 0f32 };
  |        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
- testdata/err/closure_type_mismatch.tn:1:20
1 | main = || -> i32 { 0f32 };
  |                    ^^^^ expected i32 but got f32
- testdata/err/closure_type_mismatch.tn:1:14
1 | main = || -> i32 { 0f32 };
  |              --- declared return type is i32
